conbody.p: You need to store private plugins in the <project_name>/Plugins folder for to treat them as local plugins. There are two types of plugins: Platform and Custom Keyword. Noticeably, Platform plugins need storing in the <project_name>/Plugins/platform folder.
Below is the structure of the Plugins folder:
conbody.codeblock:
Plugins
|
|___ platform
|___ IDE plugin 1.jar
|___ IDE plugin 2.jar
|___ ....
|___ IDE plugin n.jar
|___ Custom keyword plugin 1.jar
|___ Custom keyword plugin 2.jar
|___ ...
|___ Custom keyword plugin n.jar
